official_title: A bill to amend Title 5, United States Code, to revise the definition of air traffic controllers entitled to immediate retirement annuities under section 8336(e), and for other purposes.

summary.text: Entitles a Federal employee who provides preflight, inflight, or airport advisory service to aircraft operators (or who supervises such an employee) to a civil service annuity in accordance with provisions governing air traffic controllers.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 5, United States Code, to revise the definition of air traffic controllers entitled to immediate retirement annuities under section 8336(e), and for other purposes.
